Text: If you ask the other kids in your eighth grade classroom they could help you post this stuff in chunks bigger than 999999999 bytes. Then you wouldn't have to post those lame instructions each time. Your mind must be a scary place indeed.
Your bosses at Homeland Security should provide you better copy to post, goon.  Get a real job.
Craziest set of torrents I've encoutered. One truly needs higher education to end up with a functioning video file
